extendedInfo.description: The Tuborg Bar Genie is three little helpers rolled into one App.Fool-A-RoundAmaze your mates with some seemingly impossible bar tricks. They may even buy you a TuborgSpin-A-RoundSpin the Tuborg to help you decide upon some of life's trickier decisions like who's round is it.Find-A-RoundHelps you locate your nearest cold pint of Tuborg

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Great app, love the bar tricks!
reviews.author: A Google User
